alert.note: Alert for York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 7:02PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN YORK COUNTY THROUGH 730 PM EDT... At 700 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms from Stewartstown to Brogue, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation possible. Locations impacted include... Stewartstown, Delta, Cross Roads, Brogue, Sunnyburn, Susquehanna Trails, Winterstown, Felton, Fawn Grove, Peach Bottom and Airville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
